import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"useful-conventions"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#useful-conventions"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Useful Conventions`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Based on extensive testing we've created these rules to help you optimize the workflow.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"always-name-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#always-name-blocks"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Always name blocks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is better`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button Vetrical
onClick <buy
Label Text
text Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Than this`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Vetrical
onClick <buy
Text
text Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"extract-blocks-as-view-files-to-keep-the-composition-simple"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#extract-blocks-as-view-files-to-keep-the-composition-simple"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Extract blocks as view files to keep the composition simple`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is better`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button
onClick <buy
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Than this`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button Vetrical
onClick <buy
Label Text
text Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Where `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Button`}</MDXTag>{` is a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Button.view`}</MDXTag>{` file`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Button Vetrical
onClick <
Label Text
text Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"dont-name-slots-unless-you-absolutely-have-to"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#dont-name-slots-unless-you-absolutely-have-to"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Don’t name slots unless you absolutely have to`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is better`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
text < Buy Now
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Than this`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
text <label
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If you avoid naming slots, you can use the properties by the same name at the point of use`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label
text Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Otherwise, you would have to remember what is the custom name of the slot`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label
label Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"keep-slots-simple"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#keep-slots-simple"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Keep slots simple`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is better`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
onWhen <isVisible
text Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Than this`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
onWhen <button.isVisible
text Buy Now!
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Manage these in the logic file and expose simple slot back to the view like the
one above `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`<isVisible`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Simple slots are easier for designers to reason about and they are editable
in the Views Tools.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"dont-repeat-blocks-use-lists"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#dont-repeat-blocks-use-lists"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Don't repeat blocks, use lists`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This is better`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Books List
from <
Book
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Than this`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Book

Book

Book

Book
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`In design tools, we tend to duplicate elements in the layout to represent the lists.
In production, we use lists with data passed dynamically from external data.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"design-system-folders"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#design-system-folders"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Design System folders`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Any folders you create inside of the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`src`}</MDXTag>{` in your project will be recognized by
Views Tools and displayed on the side nav.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Here's the example structure that usually works for modern applications, but you
can organize your project the way fits your needs:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre">{`Buttons
Captures
Cards
Custom
Icons
Images
Lists
Main
MicroCopy
Navigation
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"FoldersSample.png","alt":"Folders in Views Tools"}}></MDXTag>{`
Any .view files saved in the main `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`src`}</MDXTag>{` folder will be shown in `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Ungrouped`}</MDXTag>{` folder
in Views Tools.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If you use `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Main`}</MDXTag>{` folder to keep the top level views of your application, it will be
a default folder in Views Tools, making it easy to explore the layouts to designers.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"for-readability-put-the-onwhen-property-as-a-first-line-below-the-blocks-name"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#for-readability-put-the-onwhen-property-as-a-first-line-below-the-blocks-name"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`For readability, put the onWhen property as a first line below the block's name`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This reads better in Views Tools and in code`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
onWhen <isVisible
fontSize 14
color green
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Than this`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-views"}}>{`Label Text
fontSize 14
color green
onWhen <isVisible
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Reach out with questions via our `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://slack.viewsdx.com/"}}>{`Slack Questions Channel`}</MDXTag>{`.
Mention `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@tom`}</MDXTag>{` or `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`@dario`}</MDXTag>{` to make sure that we get your notifications.`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
